changelog.change_log:
This update includes:

- Improved save file error handling

- Fix for a bug where reeling in could be too fast

- Fix for a bug with avatar hairs

- A slew of minor bugs which could cause UI issues were fixed

This patch contains various bug fixes:

- Improved save file error handling

- Fix for a bug where reeling in could be too fast

- Fix for a bug with avatar hairs

- A slew of minor bugs which could cause UI issues were fixed
- This update contains a fix for save files sometimes being broken in the previous version.

- Denying mic permission no longer blocks you from entering multiplayer experience

- Fixed a couple of other situations blocking you from entering multiplayer experience

- Improved Meta Avatar loading

- More consistent Vendomatic behaviour

- Moved the push to talk option toggle to settings window

- Various bug fixes

New features:
- Toggling 'Push to talk' is now also editable through settings (no longer required going to Casters' Cove)
- Varying fish sizes in Penguin Point

Bugfixes:
- Players that deny microphone permissions can now enter Penguin Point without crashing
- Re-enabled Exit Game (Go To Docks) button in settings
- Improvements to multiplayer inventory coins and items loading between save slots
- Fixed bug where multiplayer coins and multiplayer items bought  in Penguin Point was not saved until scene change, now also saved when fish is caught and item bought
- Improvements to Avatar loading when CDN fails
- Pink gator trash fish no longer counted towards game completion
- Bugfix where advanced singleplayer items in Jimbob's Shop were not available to buy unless certain singleplayer gear was equipped

Known issues:
- Players who deny mic permissions can not hear other players in multiplayer while in Penguin Point

1.14.193452 patch notes

Known issues:
- entering penguin point (multiplayer scene) without allowing microphone access can crash the game.

Bug fixing
- fixed crash caused by joining a multipalyer room with idle host.
- fixed bug with the mute button not working in penguin point after having used push-to-talk.
- fixed bug where ther chair would sometimes disapear after having visited the vending machine.
- fixed missing questline completed popup.

Visual updates
- fixed trash croc aligenment.
- fixed snow poof effect.
- fixed various UI glitches.
- improved water shader.
- improved vending machine visuals.
- added vending machine item rarity effect.

Tweaks
- made return to fishing chair mechanic work similar to other movement.

Additions
- added info popup on first visit to penguin point.
- added info access button on multiplayer page in fish-o-dex.
corrupt save data fix and logging

- Set 90 Hz refresh rate on Quest 2
- Improved visual fidelity on Quest 2
- Improved visual fidelity on Quest 1
- Improved and more consistent placement in world
- Faster initial load time
- Changed rod grip to decrease risk of controllers colliding when cranking
- Fixed fish not spawning when using certain language device settings

- Fixed performance issue that could occur when grabbing the handle repeatedly
- Minor fixes
